Class Runfile

java.lang.Object
main.Runfile
public class Runfile extends Object
The main file which contains the CLI flags, global ENV variables, and runs the project!

      projectName - The project name as a string
      Returns:

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      Returns the filewriter in question

      Parameters:
      yamlfile - The YAML file to read from.
      projectFolder - The main folder for the project.
      Returns:
      infoString The String to return
      Throws:
